Name: Gold Dust
About the game: Gold Dust - is a hardcore adventure in the spirit of games of nineties. Everything looks like in shooters of nineties except one thing – you will fight with evil using swords! You are a nameless hero who knows about a secret artifact named “Gold Dust”. His power is great. Nobody can imagine what the owner is able to do. Rumours say it will allow to become a creature like God. Is that true? You are able to figure out getting over this hard adventure. Fights with evil, look for ammunition, search new location, use your magic possibilities. Be sure – the game will be exciting for you! Game features: · Unique fight system · Possibility to use magic · Large and various levels · High difficulty which hardcore lovers like
